message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid I was thinking more along the lines of a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking of $8500. Would that work for you?
I'm still not convinced that $8500 is the best price for this product. I'd be willing to meet you at $7500. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of $8200. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to think I've been too generous with my offers so far. I'd be willing to meet you at $7000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you can meet me at this price, I'll consider it a fair deal
